name: [0.1.0] Adventure on Mystery Island
description:
Jump and fight* your way through solving* the mystery of the island. Collect relics to gain new movement and combat* abilities, and venture further through the open world.

*Note: Version 0.1.0 is extremely buggy and incomplete. This release was made in just 4 weeks as a self-imposed challenge. Your feedback on what currently exists, and what will be in the future will be greatly appreciated.  A list of known issues below:

  • Godot 4 is still in beta, so crashes may happen randomly.
  • Enemies don't exist because I spent too much time making their mechanics "work" that I didn't think about the performance impact of having 50+ enemies processing all at once.
  • The mystery of the island cannot be solved.
  • Ledge grabbing near slopes can be problematic.
  • Controls cannot be rebound
  • Video settings cannot be changed
  • Player can get stuck with no other option than to reset
  • Almost no sounds
  • Some other stuff I can't think of because it's 2AM and I'm burnt-out/sleep-deprived.

The game will continue to be updated until it's "complete". Updates may be slow to roll out. Mac builds will be made available in future updates.
This game is currently free, but I may put a price tag on it once I get it to a point where it's substantial.
